name: | ROBO WARRIORS | Mr. Crump
description:
Mr. Crump
weapon : Missile launch
power : 4/5
defence : 1/5
soul :3/5

story :
A former president known for his arrogance and stupidity attends an event that changes him for the better. Because of his stupidity when he was president, people chased him after he resigned, and while being chased by bounty hunters he was saved by a grandmother who helped him sincerely, and the grandmother said "because you gave love to my twitter status" when Mr. Crump asked why he was different of people and willing to help them. After that incident, Mr. Crump vows to do more good and gather his former generals to continue the project of weapons of mass destruction used to protect the earth from evil forces.
